name: labor_parameter_lod_shape
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(labor_parameter_lod_shape:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(Level of Documentation.No Documentation)*>){0}{[IF]([OR](<*ISSELECTED(Level of Documentation.Screen Captures Only)*>,<*ISSELECTED(Level of Documentation.Powertool Report (Access))*>)){0.05}{[IF](<*ISSELECTED(Level of Documentation.Text Description & Screen Captures)*>){0.1}{[IF](<*ISSELECTED(Level of Documentation.Advanced Documentation)*>){1}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
description:
If lod = No Documentation, LD = 0
Else If lod = Screen Captures Only OR lod = Powertool Report, LD = 0.05
Else If lod = Text Description & Screen Captures, LD = 0.1
Else If lod = Advanced Documentation, LD = 1
